sys_ui_page.html:
Support

Setting-up the Cyberint ServiceNow Security App

The ServiceNow system administrator is required to provide the API access token in the Cyberint ServiceNow Security App.

This enables the Cyberint ServiceNow security app to connect with your Cyberint instance.

After the connection is established, the Cyberint ServiceNow Security App will import all the available Threat Command alerts to ServiceNow as incidents.

If you do not have an API access token, contact your Cyberint administrator.

Properties:

  • You must be the ServiceNow system administrator
  • You must have an API access token
  • In the API Token field, enter the API access token

Procedure:

  1. Log-in to ServiceNow as a system administrator
  2. Navigate to left navigation page > Cyberint ServiceNow Security App > Configurations
  3. The time zone between the ServiceNow platform and the ETP Suite must be the same. For more information, see Setting-up Time Zone.
For more information, visit Cyberint page suppport
